original: aa pa r'a dzi ta s'a dha nam /
analyzed: aa pa r'a dzi ta s'a dha nam /

original: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of Aparajita

original: 'phags ma khros ma rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma khros ma rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Lady Aparajita.

original: rnam par rgyal ma ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ma ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
translated: Aparajita is yellow, with one face and two arms.

original: lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes ma /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes ma /
translated: She is beautiful with various divine jewels.

original: tshogs bdag rnam par mnan ma /üîΩg-yas pa thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul byas pa'i phyag go //
analyzed: tshogs bdag rnam par mnan ma / g-yas pa thal mo sbyar ba'i tshul byas pa'i phyag go //
translated: She tramples on Ga·πáapati.üîΩHer right hand is in the gesture of supplication.

original: g-yon na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub snying gar 'chang ba'i phyag go //
analyzed: g-yon na zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub snying gar 'chang ba'i phyag go //
translated: Her left hand, holding a noose, makes a threatening forefinger at her heart.

original: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa'i zhal can ma /
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa'i zhal can ma /
translated: She has a fierce face with bared fangs that cause great fear.

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa gdug cing mi bzad pa'i rnam pa'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa gdug cing mi bzad pa'i rnam pa'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing /
translated: She is surrounded by gods of fierce and terrible forms, such as BrahmƒÅ.
She is raised up with an umbrella held aloft.

original: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
translated: The Means of Achievement of Aparajita is complete.

original: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo ts'a ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the pandit Amoghavajra and the Khampa translator-editor Gelongma Palmo.
